good.name: Skimmed Milk (79%)
good.reason: Excellent source of high-quality protein and calcium with minimal fat; suitable for your eggetarian diet.

good.name: Milk Solids
good.reason: Provides concentrated dairy protein to support muscle recovery and satiety.

good.name: Water
good.reason: Essential for hydration and used as a base for the milkshake consistency.

okay.name: Cocoa Powder
okay.reason: Provides natural chocolate flavor and antioxidants, but flagged due to your lead sensitivity as cocoa can contain trace amounts of heavy metals.

okay.name: Nature Identical Flavouring Substances
okay.reason: Chemically identical to natural flavors; generally safe but lacks the nutritional benefits of whole food extracts.

okay.name: Acidity Regulators (INS 340, 452, 339)
okay.reason: Common food additives used to maintain pH and stability; safe in standard consumed quantities.

okay.name: Edible Common Salt
okay.reason: Used for flavor enhancement and provides essential electrolytes, though contributes to sodium intake.

bad.name: INS 407 (Carrageenan)
bad.reason: A thickener derived from seaweed that has been linked to digestive inflammation and gut sensitivity in some individuals.

bad.name: INS 955 (Sucralose)
bad.reason: An artificial sweetener used to achieve zero sugar; while calorie-free, some studies suggest it may affect gut microbiome health.
